Variable Documentation

W dxul vbox

Initial value:

 function(node){
    this.tagName = 'vbox';
    
    this.init(node);

    this.core = W.style('table', 'width:100%;');
    
    this.trs = [];
    
    this.add = function(child){
        var tr = self.core.insertRow(-1);
        W.style(tr, 'width:100%;cursor:default');
        self.trs[self.trs.length] = tr;
        tr.appendChild(child);
        
        
    };
}
